timeline.bodyText: don't we want to send any meaningful data inside this event?
timeline.author: tangrammer

replies.bodyText: I can't think of anything else that can/should be tracked, do you have any ideas?
replies.author: marvinkome

replies.bodyText: @janagombitova  maybe could know better... I'm thinking on formId, or instanceId 🤔
replies.author: tangrammer

replies.bodyText: I asked her, she said just this text is good enough
replies.author: marvinkome

replies.bodyText: @tangrammer and @marvinkome would instanceId mean the organisation - so icco.akvoflow.org? That would be interesting to see, which partner uses the webforms the most. But having the basic usage count is also good enough, if knowing the partner is too much effort.
replies.author: janagombitova

replies.bodyText: @janagombitova would that mean the current url?
replies.author: marvinkome

replies.bodyText: I thought about this over the night and decided it is good enough just to have the count. We do not need more for now and should keep things to the minimum. Once we want to know more, we can add the properties later. So no need for extra data
replies.author: janagombitova
